overallSummary: Fabio Giglietto maintains a strong social media presence across multiple platforms, with a total of 3,580 followers. Engagement rates vary by platform, but LinkedIn shows the highest engagement levels, likely due to the professional and research-oriented nature of the content.

contentThemes.description: Posts frequently highlight advancements in research, new tool releases, and grant announcements.
Several posts focus on hiring opportunities and invitations to join research teams.
Mentions of upcoming conferences and presentations, indicating active participation in academic communities.

recommendations: Increase frequency of interactive posts, such as Q&A sessions, to boost engagement.
Leverage visuals and infographics to make complex research topics more accessible.

platformInsights.mastodon: Engagement on Mastodon is moderate, with technical and research-focused content receiving attention.
platformInsights.linkedin: LinkedIn posts receive high engagement, particularly those related to research milestones and job opportunities.

topPerformingContent.content: Excited to announce that our research team has been awarded a new grant to study information operations across social media platforms.
Just published our new paper on coordinated inauthentic behavior on social media platforms!
